author: hustla187
title: Good at the Race
review: IF you have seen or been to a Formula 1 or NASCAR race, you might have seen this vehicle. It is a vehicle that leads the racers along the track in case the track is slippery or a car crash. The sirens are pretty cool and it is useful on the track. Overall, this is a very good set.

author: nameless73
review:
I must admit that the combination model is rather an odd construction.  I like the rear lights in the model, but otherwise it still looks like two models thrown together.

The red face stickers are also the wrong way up when following the instructions.

author: nivracer
title: pace car
review:
i got this at late 2009 this set is OK. the only problem is 2 of the stickers started to peel of. so i pulled them off. otherwise this set is great. no stickers are on 2 bricks.that is it. not good reaview.

author: jerrie11
title: pace car nascar
review:
Box/Instructions

cool box

Parts

the parts are good but nothing special without stickers

Minifigures

never in tiny turbos

The build

again nothing special

The completed model

it looks terrific and so real in a way

Overall opinion

not the best but it is the most realistic looking car from 2009

author: BrickFactoryINC
title: Good But Interesting
review:
I have had this set for a very long time back when Racers was a thing, for the size this isn't actually half bad.  The set defiantly doesn't fit in my collection, but I will never remove it from my collection.  This was a very easy and quick build and very playable.  Would only recommend it to a child or to a big Racer's fan it is just one of those things that looks good but haven't aged well

 

Very mixed but very cool ad unlike
